ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] 'Call for Help'
ygData.msgSnippet: the group I join will have more considerate and forgiving people in it. Yeah, they should just all ignore the fact that you are wrongly accusing people.
ygData.messageBody:
"the group I join will have more
considerate and forgiving people in it."

Yeah, they should just all ignore the fact that you are wrongly accusing
people. Rofl, and you blame people that actually know-it-all? =P
